attributes.action: stop rejecting petitions which call for his resignation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a democracy and we are entitled to free speech.  We should be allowed to create petitions asking for the prime minister to resign.  I for one would like to sign such a petition but cannot because all such petitions are rejected.

rejection.details:
In fact there are several such petitions live on the site obtainable through a simple search:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/pm-resign-now/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Fianance/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saveenglandnow/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
